www.title: Coolha
www.subtitle1: Digital growth momentum, connecting more users to the Web3 world
www.subtitle2: Empowering creators, brands, communities, and organizations
www.description: A decentralized social application developed on the blockchain

company.title: Coolha Limited
company.subtitle: Making data information ownable, trustworthy, and valuable
company.description0: A software technology company focused on Web3 technology development and applications, established in Hong Kong on August 26, 2025.
company.description1: We hope to change production relations through technology, contribute to world civilization progress, and make the world a better place
company.description2: We believe that the development of Web3 and blockchain is not just technological and internet progress, but also a positive concept that can extend to various fields
company.description3: Public blockchain is an important technology for world unity, global solidarity, democratic governance, and solving trust issues
company.mission_desc: To promote internet progress and world civilization advancement, create exciting products and services, and make the world better
company.vision_desc: Making data information ownable, trustworthy, and valuable
company.values_desc: Always user-centered, avoiding excessive commercialization and financialization, ensuring fair rights for all
company.innovation_desc: Committed to continuously exploring and applying cutting-edge technologies to provide better Web3 products and service solutions.
company.development_desc: DAPP, frontend websites, EVM smart contracts Solidity, UI/UX design, product architecture, blockchain application technology
company.market_desc: Market research reports, data analysis, technical research articles, etc.
company.marketing_desc: Advertising traffic, NFT marketing solutions and other technologies, providing revenue solutions for creators and enterprises
company.planning_desc: Web3 business model research, providing market research, marketing planning, content creativity, brand planning, corporate image design, etc.
company.digital_marketing_desc: Issuing digital assets based on blockchain technology to enhance brand loyalty and create unique value, establishing closer connections between users and brands
company.web3_application_desc: Dapp development, on-chain smart contract development, web3 project websites. Custom development based on business scenario requirements
company.exposure_growth_desc: Platform vertical advertising, precision marketing. Brand research and content planning to enhance consumer and fan engagement.
company.brand_building_desc: Planning brand activities, brand promotion strategies, brand image design

home.version_notice: Coolha is currently in v0.1-alpha version. We are working hard on development, please stay tuned.
